name: Gradients of Health in an Urban Mosaic
description: In this course, you will examine how Torontoâ€™s varied communities access and use health care, and how they may encounter barriers in doing so. You will study how economic disparities, shifting demographics, and government policies affect health policy and the right to access resources. Restricted to first-year students. Not eligible for CR/NCR option.
exclusions: Innis One, Munk One, New One, St. Mike's One, Trinity One, Vic One, Woodsworth One
